trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg a adatait <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> és <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"> </xref> az irányított események, valamint a kapcsolódó csatolt és események megtekintése.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: A következő csatolt események az esemény adatainak osztály használt:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>az esemény adatainak osztály base elem a következő irányított események is használatos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ezek az irányított események az általános elem modellre könnyebben megtalálják a fent felsorolt csatolt események továbbítására [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>a csatolt események és az Alap elem irányított események megoszthassák esemény, és a propagálása felfelé és az irányított események verziói tunneling is osztja meg az eseményadatokat.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Ez hatással lehet az esemény kezelt jellemzői az eseményútvonal adatcsere.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: [bemeneti áttekintése](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>esemény vagy a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>esemény (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> értéke `true` az eseményadatok), a billentyűzetfókusz nem változik.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>esemény vagy a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>esemény, a billentyűzetfókusz nem változik.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Ez az esemény társított logikai billentyűzet eszköz.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Az az idő, amikor a bemeneti történt.

trans-unit.source: The element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, amely korábban a fókuszt.

trans-unit.source: The element that now has focus.
trans-unit.target: Az elem, ami már fókuszba.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelők hív meg típusra vonatkozó módon, ami növelheti a esemény rendszer hatékonyságát.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Ez a megvalósítás a általános kezelő kerül <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>, majd meghívja az azt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Ez a megvalósítás minta és az okait, lásd: <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>és [irányított események áttekintése](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Az általános kezelő típusra vonatkozó módon hívja.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: A cél-és a kezelő hívható meg.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that focus has moved to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az elemhez tartozó fókusz át lett helyezve.

trans-unit.source: The element with focus.
trans-unit.target: Az elem aktuális.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az elem, amely korábban a fókuszt.

trans-unit.source: The previously focused element.
trans-unit.target: A korábban a kijelölt elemet.
